channel.title: Projects on Plazi
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Plazi

item.title: Ongoing and past projects
item.description: Current Projects Arcadia 2022-2025 The grant will help build on the momentum created in the first Arcadia supported project (years 2018-2021) by: (1) leading the data extraction effort and building a critical mass of FAIR scientific data and related tools involving the community; and (2) establishing a long lasting, self-sustaining research infrastructure. BiCIKL (EU) Biodiversity Community Integrated Knowledge Library (BiCIKL) is building the Biodiversity Knowledge Hub (BKH). more NIH-R21 Viral Spillover (NIH) The goal of this proposed project is to harness the collective power of bioinformatics, artificial intelligence (AI), and ecology to transform our understanding of taxon-specific zoonotic risk.
